about_the_game:
Defy gravity and test your reflexes in this fast-paced platformer challenge! Scale treacherous heights, dodge deadly obstacles, and master precise jumps to survive. Use wall jumps and unique power-ups like time freeze, slow motion, and teleportation to push your limits. Choose between two intense modes: climb through the skies in Classic Mode or escape the rising flames in the relentless Inferno Mode. With tight controls, retro aesthetics, and pulse-pounding chiptune music, every moment is a test of skill. How high can you go?


  • Fast-paced arcade gameplay – Ultra-responsive controls for pure precision.
  • Retro vibes – Stylish pixel art with nostalgic visual effects.
  • Precision platforming – Wall jumps, tricky landings, and no room for error.
  • Unique power-ups – Slow time, freeze hazards, or teleport to escape danger.
  • Two intense modes – Reach the skies in Classic Mode or outrun fire in Inferno Mode.
  • Epic chiptune soundtrack – Two dynamic tracks fueling the action.

Defy gravity and test your reflexes in this fast-paced platformer challenge! Scale treacherous heights, dodge deadly obstacles, and master precise jumps to survive. Use wall jumps and unique power-ups like time freeze, slow motion, and teleportation to push your limits. Choose between two intense modes: climb through the skies in Classic Mode or escape the rising flames in the relentless Inferno Mode. With tight controls, retro aesthetics, and pulse-pounding chiptune music, every moment is a test of skill. How high can you go?


  • Fast-paced arcade gameplay – Ultra-responsive controls for pure precision.
  • Retro vibes – Stylish pixel art with nostalgic visual effects.
  • Precision platforming – Wall jumps, tricky landings, and no room for error.
  • Unique power-ups – Slow time, freeze hazards, or teleport to escape danger.
  • Two intense modes – Reach the skies in Classic Mode or outrun fire in Inferno Mode.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, arm64 equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 12
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, arm64 equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon / NVIDIA Geforce
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

name: Blockcharted

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon / NVIDIA Geforce
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

short_description: Defy gravity in this fast-paced platformer. Master wall jumps, dodge obstacles, and use powerful bonuses like freeze time and teleportation to overcome challenging jumps. Every move counts in this precise and intense experience.
